name: Why Japan is Good for Job?
text: In the two years since Green Box was established, we have received job offers from companies in many industries and occupations.We introduce not only foreigners living in Japan, but also talented people who can make use of their foreign language skills to a wide range of companies in Japan. We can provide you with job offers for specialist and managerial positions that suit you. We have introduced excellent personnel to construction companies, golf courses, president drivers, convenience stores, etc. Our company is also characterised by our global network, and we also provide personnel support to foreign-affiliated companies and companies that are expanding their business overseas. Job seekers and companies in need of human resourcesPlease feel free to contact us.

name: なぜ日本は就職に向いているのか?
text: グリーンボックスが誕生して2年、たくさんの業界、職種の企業から求人票をお預かりしております。在日外国人だけとは限らず海外の語学力を活かす優秀な人材も、日本の様々な企業に紹介しております。専門職や管理職等々皆様に合う求人票のご案内が可能です。今までの実績としては建設会社、ゴルフ場、社長運転手、コンビニエンストetc.に優秀な人材を紹介してきました。弊社の特徴はグローバルネットワークにも力を入れており、外資系や海外進出企業の人材サポートもしています。求職者、人材が欲しい企業の皆様一度お気軽にご連絡ください。
